properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 10 at 8:45PM PST until February 12 at 6:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
7 to 11 feet at 13 seconds.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 6 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 6 AM PST WEDNESDAY
